modName: Ciri - from The Witcher 3 Racemenu preset
summary: Racemenu preset for Ciri from The Witcher 3.
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[b]RaceMenu presets for Ciri from The Witcher 3.

[/b][b][img]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140902222834/sorceleur/images/8/81/Ciri.png[/img]
[/b][b]

I couldn't find any Ciri (from TW3) preset on the internet for skyrim, so i decided to make one! This is the first time[/b][b] i upload something on [/b][b]the [/b][b]Nexus. I hope you will like it.[/b][/center][center][b]

You have 3 files, each for one kind of eyes (1 classic and 2 glowings eyes presets).

[/b]

[color=#00ff00][size=4][u][b]Requirement:[/b][/u]
[/size][/color]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]
KS Hairdos 400 (check Google)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty (for classic)[/url]

or/and

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21232/?]Glowing Eyes v4[/url]


[color=#00ffff][size=3][u][b]Mods used in screenshots for intended look:[/b][/u]
[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url][b]   ([/b]or whatever body texture you like!)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG female Eyebrows[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61897/?]Daylight ENB[/url][size=2]  (It should be fine with every ENB out there!)[/size]


[b][u][color=#ff7700][size=4]Installation:

[/size][/color][/u][/b]1) Extract the .rar file in your "..\Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets" folder.
2) Go to the race menu (with a new game or by typing ".showracemenu" in the skyrim ingame console).
3) Set race to Nord and go to the presets tab, hit F9 to load a preset.
4) Select one of the 3 ".jslot" file and you are done!



[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]What's next?[/b][/size][/color]

Better skin for more realistic result.
Better scar
Suitable cloth

[b][color=#ffff00][size=4]Last note
[/size][/color][/b]
- Feel free to upload your screenshots with better enb/enhancement from this preset
- Give your opinion and improvement that should be needed for this preset
- Endorse if you like this
- If you want to upload this preset elsewhere, be sure to ask me first.




[img]http://37.media.tumblr.com/e189a30a3b62b39e94e4e3173b624b96/tumblr_n6ppy7jo3C1qfpe3mo1_500.gif[/img][/center]
author: Junctionbe
